job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pMachine Learning Engineer  Remote ppnbspppDo want to be part one of the most innovative Machine Learning teams at an internationally leading technology companyppbrppYes Read on  ppbrppThis enterprise generates over 6 billion Euros annually and operates in niche areas within Computer Vision Machine Learning and Optical TechnologynbspppnbspppIn this role youll work alongside the best Driving the algorithmic development of cutting edge digital products in a diverse team of scientists and researchers ppnbspppYoull also have freedom to design new visions and prototypes for a varied consumer products roadmap ppbrppTo be a good fit youll needppnbsppulliExtensive experience with applied machine leaning research preferably computational imagingliliProficiency in Python TensorFlow and PyTorchliliA great knowledge of imagevideo processing Neural style transfer Image fusion liulpnbspppThis is great opportunity to work in a highly collaborative environmentnbspIn a spacious modern setting with lots of opportunities for further developmentp
